page.title: 07Tools in Thorpe Hesley.
page.content: We use tools to help in our home life in many ways in the garden we use electric, hand powered and petrol mowers.For longer gardens we use small tractors.The new hover mowers are also popular. For wood work we use planes, electric drills,electric sanders, power and chain saws and surforms as well as traditional tools.We have many tools in the kitchen to help us prepare food.We use blenders, electric knives, toasters, gas and electric cookers with hoods to get rid of unwanted smells. We use special tools to service our cars. Some people do their own repairs using jacks, spanners and airpumps for punctures, screw drivers, electric drills, welding torches, pressure gauges, and spray guns.
